## Packages Required

<div style="float:left; margin-right: 20px;">
  <img src="2.png" width="350px">
</div>

**The following packages were used:**

- **readr:** Provides fast and friendly functions to read rectangular data (like CSVs) into R.

- **dplyr:** Offers a consistent set of functions for data manipulation, such as filtering, selecting, and summarizing.

- **ggplot2:** Implements the Grammar of Graphics to create static, layered, and customizable data visualizations.

- **plotly:** Enables interactive, web-based visualizations using R, often built on top of ggplot2 plots.

- **ggthemes:** Adds additional themes, scales, and styles to enhance the aesthetics of ggplot2 plots.

- **tidyverse:** A collection of R packages designed for data science.

- **DT:** Creates interactive tables in R Markdown using the DataTables JavaScript library.

- **Maps:** Loads the maps.

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(DT)
library(plotly)
library(ggthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
```
